      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_89548</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Comment des fossiles sont faits et découverts</string>
            <string language="en">How fossils are made and discovered</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Fossilien gebildet und entdeckt werden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como os fossils são feitos e descobertos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come i fossili sono fatti e scoperti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς τα απολιθώματα γίνονται και ανακαλύπτονται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo se hacen y se descubren los fósiles</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Quatrième dans une série de quatre illustrations  montrant comment des fossiles sont faits et découverts.  Montrées ici sont des couches de roches et sous elles sont les restes des organismes transformés en fossiles.</string>
            <string language="en">Fourth in a series of four illustrations showing how fossils are made and discovered. Shown here are layers of rocks and under them are the remains of the organisms turned into fossils.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">les fossiles</string>
            <string language="en">fossils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couches</string>
            <string language="en">layers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">organisations</string>
            <string language="en">organisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">restes</string>
            <string language="en">remains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roches</string>
            <string language="en">rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viertel in einer Reihe von vier Abbildungen, die 
zeigen, wie Fossilien gebildet und entdeckt werden. Hier gezeigt
Schichten Felsen und unter ihnen sind des Remains der organismen, die 
zu Fossilien gemacht werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fourth em uma série de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram como os fossils são feitos e descobertos. São 
mostradas aqui as camadas de rochas e sob elas são o remains dos 
organismos girados em fossils.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quarto in serie di quattro illustrazioni che
mostrano come i fossili sono fatti e scoperti. Sono indicati qui
gli strati delle roccie e sotto loro sono il remains degli organismi 
trasformati nei fossili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέταρτο σε μία σειρά τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
επιδεικνύουν πώς τα απολιθώματα γίνονται και ανακαλύπτονται. 
Εμφανισμένα εδώ είναι τα στρώματα των βράχων και κάτω από
τους είναι τα υπολείμματα των οργανισμών που μετατρέπονται σε 
απολιθώματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuarto en una serie de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran cómo se hacen y se descubren los fósiles. Se muestran
aquí las capas de rocas y bajo ellas son el restos de los organismos 
dados vuelta en fósiles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fossilien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">organismen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Remains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
